issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Hive JDBC does not recognize UNIONTYPE columns
fields.environment:
Hive 1.2.1000.2.6.1.0-129
Beeline version 1.2.1000.2.6.1.0-129 by Apache Hive

comments.body:
GitHub user pvillard31 opened a pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/hive/pull/223

    HIVE-17259 - add support for UNIONTYPE in Hive JDBC columns

    

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

    $ git pull https://github.com/pvillard31/hive HIVE-17259

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

    https://github.com/apache/hive/pull/223.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

    This closes #223
    
----
commit ad9e44a6440b119cff4f4085e1b9b9f5e653ec37
Author: Pierre Villard <pierre.villard.fr@gmail.com>
Date:   2017-08-06T21:30:56Z

    HIVE-17259 - add support for UNIONTYPE in Hive JDBC columns

----

[~pvillard] Can you please attach a patch here so our unit tests can run on it? 
See: https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Hive+PreCommit+Patch+Testing
I attached a .patch file [~ashutoshc]. Let me know if something else is required.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12893419/HIVE-17259.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to build exiting with an error

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HIVE-Build/7437/testReport

ATTACHMENT ID: 12893490 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
[~pvillard] Patch is incorrectly generated. It deletes (non-existent) lines instead of adding them.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12896412/HIVE-17259.patch

ATTACHMENT ID: 12896412 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
Thanks [~ashutoshc] for the merge and the help with the patch file!

Github user pvillard31 closed the pull request at:

    https://github.com/apache/hive/pull/223
Hive 3.0.0 has been released so closing this jira.
